title: 95/141/EC: Commission Decision of 10 April 1995 approving the plan for the approval of establishments for the purposes of intra-Community trade in poultry and hatching eggs submitted by Sweden (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION of 10 April 1995 approving the plan for the approval of establishments for the purposes of  intra-Community trade in poultry and hatching eggs submitted by Sweden (Only the Swedish text is  authentic) (Text with EEA relevance) (95/141/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: The plan submitted by Sweden for the approval of establishments for  the purposes of intra-Community trade in poultry and hatching eggs is hereby approved.
Sweden shall bring into force by 1 April 1995 the laws, regulations and administrative  provisions for implementation of the plan referred to in Article 1.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Sweden.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 April 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
